name: Galaxy Wing
description:
In Galaxy Wing, the objective is to destroy all 4 Alien Motherships while avoiding fire of enemy spaceships.

This game was made to participate in my university's Game Jam event held on October, 2018; and won the 3rd Place Award.  

Controls:

Movement: 
( W, A, S, D  Keys)
( ↑, ←,  ↓, → Keys) 
(Gamepad Left Stick) (Gamepad (D-Pad)Thrust:
(Spacebar) (Gamepad "A")Shoot:
(Left Click)
(Right Ctrl) (Gamepad "B")Level Reset:
(R key)
(Gamepad Select)Pause: 
(P key)
(Gamepad Start)
